Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Iodide \I"o*dide\, n. (Chem.) A binary compound of iodine, or one which may be regarded as binary, in which iodine has a valence of -1; as, potassium iodide. [1913 Webster +PJC]
iodide n : a salt or ester of hydriodic acid
